title.rendered: Saratoga Springs Board of Education Holds Annual Organizational Meeting

content.rendered:
The Saratoga Springs Board of Education conducted an annual organizational meeting on July 6, 2023. Watch the meeting recording through youtube.

During the meeting, Beth Braxton, Anjeanette Emeka, and Tony Krackeler took the oath of office to serve three-year terms as Board of Education members.  Additionally, the board elected Tony Krackeler to serve as president and Natalya Lakhtakia to serve as vice president of the Board of Education for the 2023-2024 school year. Students Eleanor McNamara and Darren Pasek were introduced as this year’s high school student representatives.  

To stay informed about Board of Education meetings, visit the Board of Education section of the website.

Meeting agendas and minutes are posted through BoardDocs.
